node.title: State Of Emergency - G20 Summit 2017
node.author: soldier
node.body:
Today was a day full of stress, traffic jam and a lot of negative energy....


https://picload.org/image/rplgigwi/webp.net-resizeimage36.jpg


The G20 summit takes place in my city, Hamburg, as everyone already know. The traffic was totally out of control just one day before the G20 summit should start because Donald Trump landed today and blocked the whole city centre. I was stuck in traffic for three hours and needed to park outside the area and take the train to reach my destination. I really want to mention that the police officer are doing a great job. You see police trucks, weapons and officers everywhere. In addition at least five helicopters are circling around the town to protect the world leaders. 


--------------------------------------------------------------------

I took some pictures out of my car window to show you what happened today.


I literally was staying in that position for over 30 minutes without moving a centimeter! After waiting 50 minutes I was told that the street is blocked you need to drive a different road. If I only knew that before...

https://picload.org/image/rplgigww/img_1216.jpg

https://picload.org/image/rplgirgr/img_1217.jpg


After searching for the right route I got into the second traffic jam. If I only knew what happened after that...

https://picload.org/image/rplgirgl/img_1227.jpg


People turned off their motor and got out of their cars to talk to others or to ask the police officer, who blocked the street, some questions. 

https://picload.org/image/rplgirra/img_1228.jpg


This place isnt even in the city centre but there were a lot of police officer doing their jobs. 

https://picload.org/image/rplgirdl/img_1235.jpg


https://picload.org/image/rplgirlr/ezgif.com-video-to-gif18.gif


I also had no internet connection because they turned off the signal for a specific area and thats why I couldnt search for a faster route....

https://picload.org/image/rplgirwi/ezgif.com-video-to-gif19.gif


Here are some pictures from the news to see how big the traffic jam was


http://cdn4.spiegel.de/images/image-1158553-860_poster_16x9-iost-1158553.jpg

http://cdn3.spiegel.de/images/image-1162652-860_poster_16x9-dwwn-1162652.jpg

http://www.mopo.de/image/27784688/2x1/940/470/43e3c4ea613c055a8d4b74f9077029c4/gq/verkehr-g20.jpg

http://cdn3.spiegel.de/images/image-1162746-640_panofree-qflt-1162746.jpg


-------------------------------------------------------


I just want to leave before the total chaos breaks out. The G20 summit hasnt even started yet and the town is close to be out of control. ( Not because of the safety, because of the traffic jam )

I am curious what happens next. For everybody who is in Hamburg right now - Be safe! Do not go into the centre of the city and take care of yourself!


I hope you liked the update, I will let you know if anything spectacular happens


Source -

Spiegel Online

Mopo 


Stay focused

https://img1.steemit.com/0x0/https://picload.org/image/rdrlwrgg/ezgif.com-resize.gif

Love, Soldier

node.title: Do You Need Food? We're Giving Away FREE Food Every Day & We're Happy to Share with YOU!
node.author: gardenofeden
node.body:
We are already feeding free food every single day--do you need food too? We have enough to share.


You can get free food from us at the Garden of Eden, no questions asked. Whether you need a box of food or a single meal, you can come get food. 



Right now, we have an abundance of 

  • tofu
  • whole milk
  • 2% milk
  • soy yogurt
  • eggs
  • lamb's quarter
  • herbs


Do you need or want food??


Our offerings change often, but we will share what we have with you.


Contact us via email at gardenofedenvortex@gmail.com 


We'll work out a time that works for both of us, and you can come by to get free food! 

Let us know any time you need food, and you can come get some free food. 

This is an ongoing offer, although the foods we have in abundance changes frequently. We have a lot of dairy right now that we want to share ASAP, because we don't have professional/industrial refrigeration or anything like that. If you want to help us acquire a better infrastructure to serve more people, please contact us. 


In summary, we have food, and if you or anyone you know needs or wants food, we will share!


Contact us via email at 

gardenofedenvortex@gmail.com



Blessings~*~









www.intothegardenofeden.com

node.title: Did you notice today Steemit Family that your blog posts are NOT AUTO UPVOTED BY YOURSELF any longer?   I bet some of you did not notice this change in code today!!
node.author: barrydutton
node.body:
##### <center>
 https://steemitimages.com/0x0/https://steemitimages.com/0x0/https://steemitimages.com/0x0/https://steemitimages.com/DQmf3n3rFPUdGoavakuzpnzfsbk1DbjaM1uNPyuDmDArsS8/image.png

----

Normally when you write and post a blog, the default setting is to the checkbox  here where my cursor is, in the image below, being checked where you write and format your post-- so you automatically UV (upvote) your own post.

----

![](https://steemitimages.com/DQmYPu3dKpr4r1d3MeB73EYWsXsQZupXSFRzEiMnSho8fqF/image.png)

----

As you can  see, it  is the little checkbox that says **Upvote Post** right below where you have the REWARDS option drop down box.  It is either a glitch, in the code, or the code has been changed -- so please pay attention to this.

I've been on here 11 months and I have about 800 blog posts up and it has always been auto-checked to auto upvote my post when I publish a post. 

I'm not sure why it has become unchecked now, but the norm is to UV your post when you publish.   For people with a little more (or a lot more) SP (Steem Power) -- this is a significant change and makes a big difference.  

All my posts y-day were fine, so overnight, something changed last nite or very early today in my EST zone, anyways. 

----

https://steemitimages.com/0x0/https://steemitimages.com/0x0/https://steemitimages.com/0x0/https://steemitimages.com/0x0/https://steemitimages.com/DQmWGQ9N7Ysr3o9dir4G6hXrK9s7dfAoCbjmf6YQz4Uthdw/image.png

----

#### Figured this is important for new and older Steemians alike!!!

----

https://steemitimages.com/0x0/https://steemitimages.com/0x0/https://steemitimages.com/0x0/https://steemitimages.com/0x0/https://steemitimages.com/DQmZ3h5ghWebGtF1jvRZ9mNbx76JtLLFptKUepa3mzDwZEo/image.png

----

Good night my friends, I will check in with you tomorrow!!

----

#### Thanks for reading, have a nice day.

----

https://steemitimages.com/0x0/https://steemitimages.com/0x0/https://steemitimages.com/DQmWGQ9N7Ysr3o9dir4G6hXrK9s7dfAoCbjmf6YQz4Uthdw/image.png

----
----

http://i.imgur.com/68SXQpW.gif

----
----

node.title: Bitcoin and Anarchy in Mexico - Jeff Berwick on The Keiser Report
node.author: dollarvigilante
node.body:
https://dollarvigilante.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/07/bitcoinandanarchyinmexico.jpg
I was recently in Mexico City with Max Keiser of The Keiser Report on RT talking about a wide range of topics including bitcoin, anarchy and how they may end up being the two things which help the world retake the freedoms taken from them by central banks and government. We spoke about how bitcoin came about in 2009 right at the peak of the last financial crisis as almost a gift from God. I talked about how well the Mexican economy is doing compared to the USâ€™ in addition to how difficult it is to do business in the US because of the massive number of regulations and taxation. I said one of the reasons why I personally love Mexico is that the population is generally anti-government. We also talked about things like the differences between the Mexican and US economies and how there are quite a few Americans coming to Mexico in search of greener pastures as well as how America has really turned into a massive nanny state. Plus, we highlight just how awful and expensive the medical care systems are in the US and Canada and how not only is the quality of care better in Mexico, but itâ€™s on demand and cheaper. Check out the full interview below to learn more about what itâ€™s like to live a little bit freer on the other side of the imaginary line. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xt6vyB3ttE4 If you want to learn more about cryptocurrencies check out my free four video webinar HERE. And make sure to subscribe to our Youtube channel so you donâ€™t miss any future videos. And, of course, follow us here on Steemit where The Dollar Vigilante content is always posted first! We are closing in on 10,000 followers on Steemit! Thank you!
https://img1.steemit.com/0x0/https://www.dollarvigilante.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/08/Jeff-Berwick-The-Dollar-Vigilante-Steemit-Bio-1024x221.jpg

node.title: See ETH ICOs Craze? Meet Useless Ethereum Token!
node.author: kingscrown
node.body:
Anyone checking cryptos right know is aware of crazy Ethereum based ICOs that mostly pay out really good. While some of this tokens are really coded new things on the network many are just a copy-paste template of ERC20 to get funding. http://i.imgur.com/fnONU7D.png So for laugh (just like DOGE long ago) some guys made a token called - Useless Ethereum Token UET. http://i.imgur.com/1PFCYAL.png ## ICO Investment http://i.imgur.com/nS5L8PV.png Sounds like trolling right? Well it just got real. Its trading! HitBTC exchange that ive already spoke of here few times added it and its running already with volume. Of course it just started, first trades are always super big on markets and we see 100% off later but the interesting thing is the coin actually getting an exchange with volumes. ## TLDR; Coin was made for lulz but remember where DOGE is now! http://i.imgur.com/qLr2AZG.png

Follow, Resteem and VOTE UP @kingscrown creator of http://fuk.io blog for 0day cryptocurrency news and tips!

node.title: This floor generates renewable electricity with every step
node.author: adaptnetwork
node.body:
Pavegen's specialised flooring has recently been installed at London's Heathrow Airport.

Imagine being able to harness energy for your home just from your body alone. This would completely wipe out the need for polluting fossil fuels and revolutionise how we think about and use energy. One company from the UK is trying to do just thatâ€”with the help of a special type of flooring.

Pavegenâ€™s V3 Flooring

UK company Pavegen, has developed a special floor tile which generates electricity whenever someone walks over it. As people step on the tiles, their weight pushes down on electromagnetic induction generators causing them to move. The kinetic energy is then transferred into off-grid electricity which is stored in batteries.

The idea

Laurence Kemball-Cook, the founder of Pavegen, came up with the idea after doing a placement year at the energy company Eon. He was given the task of finding a way to power street lighting with solar energy and wind. But due to constraints such as a lack of sunlight and temperamental weather, he couldnâ€™t find a solution. Instead, he started thinking about other potential sources of power in urban environments. It was here that the idea for an energy harnessing floor was born.

Given its usability, youâ€™d think companies would have jumped at the chance to install this smart floor. However, after developing the technology it took Kemball-Cook several years to convince people to take it on. Speaking to The Guardian on how he got his first deal, he said:

Investors wouldnâ€™t invest without tiles in the ground, so I broke into a building site on the south bank of the Thames at 2am, installed the product illegally, took photos and put them on our website saying: â€˜Celebrating our latest installation.â€™ I closed a deal with Westfield pretty soon after that.

Projects around the world

Since then, Pavegen has completed over 150 projects around the world, across various sectors including train stations, shopping centres, airports and public spaces. Itâ€™s also worked with brands like Coca-Cola and Siemens.

Itâ€™s most recent installations were in West End London and in Heathrow Airport.

Our Head of Comms (at)alexmwjohnson filming with (at)fastcompany today at our latest install in the heart of London's West End! Discussing how we are creating a smart, sustainable oasis just off one of the busiest areas in the city ğŸ‡¬ğŸ‡§ The project is launching soon - watch this space!

Photo: Pavegen/Instagram

As people jet off on their holidays, they also contribute to powering the lights at @heathrow_airport through their footstepsğŸ‘£ âœˆï¸ Look out for us in Terminal 3!

Photo: Pavegen/Instagram

Data collection

As well as producing electricity, the floor tiles also collect data. This data can then be used to measure footfall, predict peak timings and prime locations, ideal information for surrounding businesses like shops, cafes and restaurants. Likewise, anyone who steps on the tiles who is connected via a mobile APP collects points. Each footstep collected is converted into a digital currency that can be used to reward loyalty or to donate to charitable causes.

Pavegenâ€™s smart flooring appears a fantastic invention which has got people excited about alternative sources of energy. Itâ€™s not only encouraging people to walk in cities, rather than drive or take the bus, but also to think about energy consumption and how we can reduce our impact on the environment. Better for our health, better for the planet.

Featured image: Pavegen/Facebook

adaptnetwork.com | Inspiring life's adventure

node.title: Steemvoter Guild: "Nominate-a-Friend" for the Guild Vote (Thursday July 6)
node.author: steemvoter
node.body:
https://cdn.pixabay.com/photo/2016/06/09/10/00/smartphone-1445489_960_720.jpg
## Previous first place winner - [Struggles of An Indian Girl | Before Birth To After School | Personal Experience | Part 1 - 3 by @indian-mom](https://steemit.com/life/@indian-mom/struggles-of-an-indian-girl-or-before-birth-to-after-school-or-personal-experience-or-part-1-3-by-indian-mom) by @indian-mom Today's guild nomination is a tale of a "Good Son" who helped his @indian-mom get her post noticed and voted for on the Steemvoter Guilds, a teen with only 22 SP in his Steem wallet managed to use what he had to get bot support and networked with others to help his mom's post get voted for the win. He indicated to us that his mom made many sacrifices for him and loves him very much, in return he promoted and uplifted her on Steem. This is the kind of good that comes out of collaborative ventures such as Steemvoter Guilds and makes what we do mean something. Thank you for solidifying our purpose @indian-mom and Good Son. ## Previous runner-up - [Tutorial Drawing Hanzo from Overwatch Game](https://steemit.com/art/@ferdian/tutorial-drowing-hanzo-from-overwatch-game) by @ferdian
Now on to today's nominations... ## The "Nominate-a-Friend" Steemvoter (SV) Guild program. So how does it work? Simple ... reply with a comment to this post with the link to another Steemian's post you think deserves the daily Steemvoter guild upvote, you are welcome to motivate in the reply why you think they deserve it. The reply with the highest upvote $ value will be the winner and the post nominated in that reply will receive the guild upvote, which as you may have seen from previous posts, is a generous upvote from over 500 guild members, giving $100 dollars or more to the author depending on starting value. Please make sure your nomination follows these guidelines: ## Two Winner Trial Test We are currently voting the top two winning nominations at an equal vote weight each. ## Basic Guidelines + **You cannot submit your own post or that of your other related accounts that you own or share ownership in**, if you are found or reported to do this and substantially verified, your and your related accounts will be blacklisted from future guild vote eligibility. + No religious, NSFW, racist, trolling, fake news or inappropriate posts will be considered, in which case runner's up will be selected. @steemvoter has the final word as to which post is selected for the daily vote. + We will not vote the same author in a seven-day window. + **Cut-off time:** We will choose the highest value comment nomination within 48 hours of this post becoming active. Please only submit posts that are still within their 7 day voting window, and allow enough time for the guild vote to be done before their payout window closes. + This is not about curation rewards for the guild members and getting in early on the vote etc, it is purely to reward the deserving author. + @steemvoter will consider this a free market experiment and we will facilitate the voting of the post that the community wants voted, without checking for PLG of content, photos and artwork. At our discretion, blatantly inappropriate posts will not be voted on however. + This is a beta guild project and terms are subject to change at any time. # Let's make Steem great ... together!!
![](https://steemitimages.com/DQmexGbcEFRk2RsNjb3g8x3xWFYZuXmNptdAFgEDpThsYGi/image.png)
# The Steemvoter Guild If you are not already a part of our **[SV Guild](http://www.steemit.com/@steemvoter)** please support our service and the authors we uplift by signing up at [steemvoter.com](https://steemvoter.com/); add your Steem account and make sure the **"Guild"** checkbox is enabled for each account you load on the dashboard. In addition, you will be able to use our bot service to select your own authors to auto-vote; the guild vote is an additional daily donation to a deserving Steem author. Steemvoter is a public curation bot with an easy to use interface, it truly is a bot for the people, making automatic curation on Steemit easy with just a few clicks. This is a payment post! Thank you for allowing us to use your Steem accounts to upvote this post by virtue of your free subscription to our bot service! Anyone not signed up at [steemvoter.com](https://steemvoter.com/) is welcome to do so or just vote this post to help the project. **And if you missed it, be sure to check out our [Steemvoter Week In Review for June 19 - 24](https://steemit.com/steemvoter/@steemvoter/steemvoter-week-in-review-for-june-19-24) for previous guild vote winners & Steemvoter news.**
## Paying for Premium Services with Bitcoin and other Alt Coins Our premium services allow you up to 500 voting rules regardless of your Steem Power holdings, and exempts you from our daily self-vote payment posts, however you can still choose to add the @steemvoter account to your rules and decide your own timing to vote our posts. To pay for premium services send 3 SBD to the @steemvoter account for a one month subscription or multiples of 3 SBD for a bulk payment. We have been asked recently if we accept Bitcoin as payment, the [blocktrades.us](https://www.blocktrades.us/) service allows you to convert Bitcoin and several altcoins, including Ether, Bitshares, Dash, Litecoin, Dogecoin and more into Steem or Steem Dollars and have it sent to the Steem account of your choosing. As per the screenshot below, you can select the Bitcoin and SBD pair, populate the SBD field with 3 SBD (or multiples of 3), the receive address with **steemvoter** and **your Steem account name** in the memo field. As easy as that! ![](https://steemitimages.com/DQmekF5Z3M9xGa7qiicyAS1ARRuX81DkU7aur6H7mdvGbxF/image.png) ------------------- ## Should you require any assistance with our service please contact @cryptomancer in the [#steemvoter.com channel on steemit.chat](https://steemit.chat/channel/steemvoter.com). ----------------------- ## A witness vote for our co-owner @thecryptodrive would be much appreciated if you can spare it. Thank you so much! -------------------------
https://steemitimages.com/0x0/https://steemitimages.com/DQmRSmRyg4MdRdiKsWTMbfyiAG673K1yP65MoUTbCXGp9Xi/PAL-FOOTER.gif
Please support P.A.L and @minnowsupport by joining their [Discord group](https://discord.gg/E4t4efP), it's an amazing community that uses Steemvoter to grow its member base.

node.title: My Photoshoot with Kendrick Lamar Outside the World Famous Roscoe's in Los Angeles
node.author: jefflombardo
node.body:
![Kendrick Lamar Outside Roscoes.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmbQgk4WYb7bAd88xqLrphDoxVuCPrMVjLXyfUG3jmZ9ZY/Kendrick%20Lamar%20Outside%20Roscoes.jpg)

We were at a XXL Magazine Cover Photoshoot, right around the corner from the World Famous Roscoe's. With that in mind, we had planned to run out to Roscoe's after the shoot to grab some quick candid, improv photo's before we left. Both Kendrick and Roscoe's are both legendary and staples of the Los Angeles culture so it only made sense.

We were outside with a large group of us when people started to take notice of what was going on. Once that caused attention, the cops came by. With only a few minutes to get these shots and move on, I was able to capture some real, raw, candid shots that have been some of the most iconic photo's I think I've taken to date.

The greatest thing about this photoshoot to me is the location, how raw and real it is, not having anything planned and just capturing the real Los Angeles vibes. The cop coming by unplanned is just icing on the cake â€” which really makes this that much more real in the era we live in.

![Kendrick Lamar Outside Roscoe's-3.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmT6Yp4UgQheEcoDyayX9sUuYxP1TyaAbuP2iVyhZ6GiGm/Kendrick%20Lamar%20Outside%20Roscoe's-3.jpg)

![Kendrick Lamar Outside Roscoe's-2.jpg](https://steemitimages.com/DQmSQqvo1oCCEUmhJg7KGpWBoNjWW9Q14NGunYgMYJNCZRe/Kendrick%20Lamar%20Outside%20Roscoe's-2.jpg)
